job.title: Machine Learning Engineer / $45 per hour DOE
job.description: We have a client who is looking to bring on a Machine Learning Engineer to join their team. This company focuses on people and how they navigate their everyday lives from things like major purchases like buying a house, life changing events like going to college or starting a new business. They focus on making sure that the data their clients/consumers have before, during and after making these big decisions is delivered effectively and set them up for success.Upon Joining The Team You Would BeWorking in close collaboration with data science and engineering teamsAnalyzing structured and unstructured data sources to determine the key business questions and hypotheses that can be explored with the data setsEvaluating approaches and algorithms based on available data and research objectivesDeveloping experimental ML Models to solve complex data mining problemsRequired Skills & Experience3+ years of experienceDegree in Computer Science or relatedPythonSnowflakeSQLAWS Sagemaker Desired Skills & ExperienceIndependent ThinkingMust have an understanding of US Retail and Online MarketsWhat You Will Be DoingTech Breakdown90% Machine Learning 10% Engineering Daily Responsibilities100% Hands OnThe OfferCompetitive Salary: Up to $45/hour DOE7 month contract-to-hireYou Will Receive The Following BenefitsMedical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA)401(k)Paid Sick Time LeavePre-tax Commuter BenefitApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future.Posted By: Treasure Kimp
